entry.tran: （衣服）上下身相连的，连体式的
entry.def: A one-piece article of clothing consists of one piece only, rather than two or more separate parts.
A one-piece is a type of woman's swimming costume that consists of one piece of material and which covers her chest.

example.ex: A one-piece is more flattering than a bikini.
example.tran: 一件式泳装比比基尼穿上去更好看。

means.word_mean: 1. (of clothing) consisting of or fashioned in a single whole piece;
